About Us

Denver, Colorado

Angelic Desolation

A four piece death metal band from Denver, Colorado featuring a full on sonic assault and a sound unique enough to call their own: American Razorgrind.

Taking influences from thrash, grindcore, death metal, horror movies and a love for the power of the riff. Known for their on stage theatrics such as baby mutilation and live abortions, their live shows push the envelope of what in your face means. Satan has bestowed upon them a 5 star rating of blasphemy due to the mayhem that ensues when their unique brand of death metal is performed.

Their third full-length titled: “Rumpus Time Is Over” released in May 2018, has seen them grow to be head and shoulders above their previous material, both in production value and songwriting. They’ve represented Colorado multiple times on some of the biggest tours, opening regional dates for Summer Slaughter, Bloodletting XI and Devastation On The Nation. With in your face performances, new music on the horizon and a growing fan base, this train will not stop

Angelic Desolation has shared the stage with the likes of Cannibal Corpse, Nile, Suffocation, Origin, The Kennedy Veil, Psycroptic, Aborted, Vale of Pnath, Carnifex, Revocation, Krisiun, After The Burial, Enterprise Earth, Ahtme, Lago, Aethereus, The Odious Construct, Chelsea Grin, Defeated Sanity, Dyscarnate, Visceral Disgorge, Venom Prison, Arkaik, Disentomb and Ingested to name a few.

The Band

Classic Four Piece

Chris Young

Bass

FOUNDING MEMBER

HOBBIES INCLUDE: POKER AND HOCKEY

FUN FACT: HAS BEEN PLAYING SINCE AGE 18 AND IS RESPONSIBLE FOR HALF OF ALL RIFFAGE

Max Thunder

Drums

THIRD AND PERMANENT BLASTER OF THE SKINS

HOBBIES INCLUDE: BASEBALL AND PROGRAMMING

FUN FACT: STARTED DRUMS IN ELEMENTARY SCHOOL, DOES FULL-STACK DEVELOPMENT FOR A FORTUNE 250 AND WITRES ALL DRUM PATTERNS

Matt Markle

Guitar

FOUNDING MEMBER

HOBBIES INCLUDE: LIFTING WEIGHTS AND DOING ALL GRAPHIC DESIGN WORK FOR THE BAND

FUN FACT: HAS BEEN PLAYING GUITAR SINCE AGE 16, OFFICIAL "LOAD IT ALL INTO THE VAN GUY" AND IS RESPONSIBLE FOR HALF OF ALL RIFFAGE

Jay Medina

Vocals

FOUNDING MEMBER

HOBBIES INCLUDE: HORROR MOVIES, GROWING WEED AND EATING BABIES ON STAGE

FUN FACT: HOSTS A HORROR MOVIE PODCAST AND IS RESPONSIBLE FOR ALL LYRICAL CONTENT
